translation:
Most Excellent Sir

Cruz Alta, July 9, 1839.

Bound by gratitude for the kindnesses of Your Excellency Your Excellency Your Excellency Your Excellency

From Your Excellency Antônio de Melo e Albuquerque

Received and replied on the 18th.

To the Most Excellent Citizen Sir Domingos José de Almeida, Distinguished Minister of Finance. Caçapava.

Santa Maria

Institutional stamp on the back of the document.
